plot: Twenty stranger accompany home buyers, and offer all their advice and opinions, as they tour three houses on the search for the perfect home.
plot_en: Twenty stranger accompany home buyers, and offer all their advice and opinions, as they tour three houses on the search for the perfect home.
plot_es: Twenty stranger accompany home buyers, and offer all their advice and opinions, as they tour three houses on the search for the perfect home.
title: Crowded House
